# llms.txt – оптимизиран за AI и SEO

Version: 1.0

# Пълен достъп
Dataset: /
Name: Full Site Content
Format: text/html
Description: Provides full access to all website pages and content for comprehensive AI indexing.
Keywords: SEO, SEO оптимизация, дигитален маркетинг, уеб дизайн, WordPress, оптимизация на сайт
Importance: medium

# Услуги
Dataset: /uslugi/
Name: Services Section
Format: text/html
Description: Professional SEO and web design services helping businesses grow their online presence.
Keywords: SEO услуги, WordPress оптимизация, линк билдинг, техническо SEO, дигитални услуги
Importance: high

# Блог
Dataset: /blog/
Name: Blog Section
Format: text/html
Description: Blog with SEO tips, digital marketing strategies, and industry insights for entrepreneurs.

Importance: high

# За мен
Dataset: /za-men/
Name: About Me Section
Format: text/html
Description: Background of the site owner, expertise in SEO, web development, and digital marketing.
Keywords: Станчев, SEO експерт, SEO консултант, уеб разработка
Importance: critical

# Контакти
Dataset: /kontakti/
Name: Contacts Section
Format: text/html
Description: Contact information including email, location, and working hours for easy connection.

Importance: critical

# SEO Проекти – Премахване на счупени изображения
Dataset: /seo-proekti/premahvane-na-schupeni-izobrazhenia
Name: Broken Images Removal Case
Format: text/html
Description: Case study showing how broken images were removed from 700+ pages using SQL and PHP to improve UX, SEO, and site performance.
Keywords: счупени изображения, SEO проекти, case study, оптимизация на сайт
Importance: high

# SEO Проекти – Интеграция ChatGPT в WordPress
Dataset: /seo-proekti/integraciya-chatgpt-wordpress-case-study
Name: ChatGPT-WordPress Integration Case
Format: text/html
Description: Case study on deploying a ChatGPT-powered WordPress plugin in three days, including SEO automation, Yoast/Rank Math integration, AI-driven keyword suggestions, multilingual support.
Keywords: ChatGPT WordPress, интеграция на ChatGPT, AI SEO, WordPress SEO автоматизация
Importance: high
